AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Amazon Web Services access key ID, for storage of uploaded files.

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: Amazon Web Services secret key, for storage of uploaded files.

AWS_STORAGE_BUCKET_NAME.description: Amazon Web Services bucket name, for storage of uploaded files.

DEFAULT_DOMAIN.description: Domain name of your deployed application, if you know if by this stage. If not, you may set it later.

RAVEN_DSN.description: If you are using Sentry for error logging, you must set the Raven DSN here. If not, you may safely leave this blank.

SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for a particular Django installation. This is used to provide cryptographic signing, and should be set to a unique, unpredictable value.

TIME_ZONE.description: Your current time-zone in Continent/City format (eg. Europe/London). If unsure enter 'UTC'.
